This torrent works...BUT there IS a problem.
The filenames are too long, windows cant cope with it, so VLC (et al) cant play it.  Worse windows cant access or rename the file & it has no properties.  THE CURE: you have to go to Dos and use the REN(rename) command in combination of the wildcard * to rename it to something sane.
   -Tom
